```{r setup}
library(add2xgb)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(xgboost)
library(tidyverse)
library(whisker)
set.seed(123)
```

```{r}
train_data <- mtcars %>% 
    rename(y = am)
```

```{r}
dtrain <- 
    xgb.DMatrix(
        data = as.matrix(
            train_data %>% select(-y)
        )
        ,label = train_data$y
    )
```

```{r}
library(xgboost)
xgb_model <- xgb.train(
    data=dtrain,
    eta = 0.1,
    max_depth = 15,
    nround=16,
    subsample = 0.5,
    colsample_bytree = 0.5,
    seed = 1,
    eval.metric = "auc",
    # eval.metric = "error",
    # eval.metric = "logloss",
    objective = "binary:logistic",
    # num_class = 12, # set the number of classes. To use only with multiclass objectives.
    nfold = 100,
    nthread = 3
)
```

```{r}
model_trees <- jsonlite::fromJSON(
	xgb.dump(xgb_model, with_stats = FALSE, dump_format='json'), 
	simplifyDataFrame = FALSE)
```

```{r}
feature_dict <- as.list(xgb_model$feature_names)
```

```{r}
library(add2xgb)
body(add2xgb::xgb_tree_sql)
```

`WHEN {{{split_long}}} < {{{split_condition}}} THEN {{{yes_sql}}}`主要看 dump 文档，这里是**小于**符号
`q`的书写保证了每个距离差了一`\n`

```{r}
body(add2xgb::xgb_sql_score_query)
```

```{r}
library(whisker)
queries <- xgb_sql_score_query(
    model_trees, 
    'mtcars',
    feature_dict
)
queries
queries %>% write_file("mtcars_model_code.sql")
```
